title: Bring back Doom Bots!

embed.description: It's finally happened. The machines have risen up and are, as we speak, attempting to overthrow their human masters. But fear not - humanity won't be going down without a fight! Riot Games has summoned five of the bravest - and arguably, best looking - heroes we could find to battle back the robot invaders.

body:
I remember this back in the day. It was so enjoyable. It felt like League CooP Boss fights.

Maybe even spice it up. at 20 minutes Have a 6th Enemy Bot come in that is Perm Lulu ulted.

Phreak's reaction to Annie dropping Tibbers on him @27:02 always makes me smile. ^_^

We worked hard to keep the casters in the dark about the mode for this showmatch, so it was the _actual_ first time they'd ever seen the Doom Bots at all. :))) 5 bombs ftw.

Bringing Doom Bots back is a tough one. It was a _very_ script heavy mode for us due to the amount of content we designed into it. I have a soft spot for them though so, hopefully one day we can figure out a way to bring them back. <3

you can't even bring it back in the very state we had it with no changes?

It's not always that easy. LoL updates very frequently (which is cool, coz we get new champs, balance, etc) but that means old things can become broken too.

For example, Veigar has a new Q that wouldn't work with the old Doom Veigar, and there's probably other spell or low-level system reworks over the past 1.5 years lurking in there that have changed things if we went back to QA the mode again. This is one of the costs of maintaining content in a game that updates so frequently.

We also prefer to improve and upgrade Game Modes where possible when bringing them back, so we'd want to add new Doom Bots, new Bonus Doom buffs, etc. ^_- If a Game Mode has clear areas we could improve on it, we always make an effort to tackle them, rather than just release the same thing again.
Got some good potential with some of the new champions released though. Personally I need to see a giant {{champion:420}} tentacle smacking down an entire lane.

So, if I may ask, if you prefer not to bring back old game modes, why bring back Legend of the Poro King? Don't get me wrong, its awesome, and probably one of the best ones you have ever put out, but even something like One for All got changed slightly and even Hexakill. LotPK however, wasn't changed at all, not in the slightest. Not even the icons were different.

I'm simply wanting to to curb curiosity of mine.

probably for the reason they just said that doom bots would be hard to change. They didnt need to change the map, aram still exists, they still had poro model so no need to change that, the snowball spell still existed, they didnt need to change player interactions at all. So, in other words, an easy mode to bring back.
